name: src/AdaptivePlayer.js
AdaptivePlayer
description:
Endeavor Streaming HTML5 Adaptive Player
Support DASH with Shaka player, support HLS with native player and hls.js
And HTTP video (mp4/ogg/webm) with native support

params.name: video
params.description: video element to play with; return error when null

name: destroy
description: Destroy instance, this instance can't be used anymore

name: nativeCanPlay
description: Determine native support of stream protocol by browser

name: support
description: Return support information

params.name: callback
params.description:
return 4 types of informations, including:
1. supported drm systems
2. supported media codecs
3. supported manifest types
4. support offline or not

name: configure
description: Set configurations of player

params.name: config.withCredentialsFragmentPattern
params.description: set to use withCredentials for segment url with defined values, by default ['/nlds/', '/nldsu/', '/nlds_vod/', '/nldsu_vod/']

params.name: config.useExternalM3U8Parser
params.description: Use external m3u8 parser for native player (DRM streams on Mac and play on iOS browsers) to get UTC time and AD-stitching related tags

params.name: config.appendXPLAYForStitching
params.description: Append playbackId for DASH stitching/failover (x-play=uuid) false by default

params.name: config.abr.startBitrate
params.description: Start playback with defined bitrate; abr.enabled should set to false

params.name: config.drm.fairplay.serverCertificate
params.description: url to get server certificate of fairplay

params.name: config.drm.params.token
params.description: cro token for authentication of license server

params.name: config.preferredAudioLanguage
params.description: enable audio track of preferred audio language; Otherwise first audio track will be selected.

params.name: config.preferredTextLanguage
params.description: enable text track of preferred text language; Otherwise first text track will be selected.

params.name: config.closedCaption.label
params.description: display label of CC, 'English' by default

params.name: config.dashCC
params.description: enable to extract CC from DASH video segment, true by default

name: load
description:
Play video with url,
Return error when url is wrong, and current playback will not be stopped while playing

params.name: startTime
params.description:
start playback from certain position in second;
if not set or set as -1, will start from 0 (VOD) or live edge (Live)
if set as 0, will start from 0 (VOD) or first segment in list (Live)
For HLS Live, time may be not accurate as player will seek to start time of TS chunk, i.e., pass 1501768500 will go to 1501768510

params.name: streamType
params.description: to set streaming type in case of url doesn't end with explicit extension; auto set according to url if set as null

name: deviceId
description: Return unique ID of this machine for playback control

name: isLive
description: Determine stream is live or vod

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true when live, false when vod

return.description: true when live, false when vod

name: gotoLive
description: Go to live position of live stream

name: play
description: Start to play, or resume

name: pause
description: Pause playback

name: stop
description: Stop playback

params.name: options.triggerPlayEndEvent
params.description: whether or not send PlayEnd event when stop called, not send event when onError

name: setAdaption
description: Determine stream switch is adaptation or manual(deprecated)

params.name: value
params.description: true is set adaptation, false is set to not.

name: setAdaptation
description: Determine stream switch is adaptation or manual

params.name: value
params.description: true is set adaptation, false is set to not.

name: selectTrack
description: Select track

params.name: optClearBuffer
params.description:
true by default. 
Set true for clear buffer when switch, which cause to pause and resume for a while; otherwise set to false for smooth playback.
For HLS/DASH, not for Native (Safari)

name: hideAllTextTracks
description: hide all text track

name: videoTracks
description:
Return video tracks
Return [] on Safari with native video player

name: audioTracks
description: Return audio tracks

name: textTracks
description: Return text tracks

name: ccTracks
description: Return text tracks for cc control (Deprecated)

properties.name: object
properties.description: self-defined object which will be passed when triggered

name: addCuepoints
description: Add cuepoint(s)

name: removeCuepoint
description: Remove cuepoint with conditions

name: getCuepoints
description: Return all cuepoints

name: removeAllCuepoints
description: Remove all cuepoints

name: getThumbnailStreams
description: Get thumbnail streams

name: getThumbnailStreamImages
description: Get thumbnails.

name: setLogLevel
description: Set log level

unknown.tagValue: set other AdaptivePlayers and make them synchronized with this AdaptivePlayer.

name: getState
description: Return state of player

name: getConfigure
description: get current configuration

name: getConfigurations
description: get current configuration

properties.name: livePointOffest
properties.description: offset to live point from current position, NaN for VOD

name: getStats
description: Return statistics of playback

name: sampleDuration
description: Get/Set current sample duration of current bitrate

name: currentTime
description: Get/Set current time of video element

name: duration
description: Get duration of video element

unknown.tagValue: {Number} In seconds, or NaN when not open, or Infinity when live

return.description: In seconds, or NaN when not open, or Infinity when live

name: streamType
description: Get stream type

name: playerType
description: Get type of player

name: buffered
description: Get buffered info of video element

name: muted
description: Get/Set mute of video element

name: volume
description: Get/Set volume of video element

name: src
description: Get/set source of video element

name: playbackRate
description: Get/Set playbackRate of video element
examples:
1.0 is normal speed
0.5 is half speed (slower)
2.0 is double speed (faster)

name: readyState
description: Indicates the readiness state of the media.

name: clearWrongCues
description: Work-around to clear wrong cues of all text tracks during slate

name: bindingMap_

name: destroy

name: listen

name: unlisten

name: removeAll
description: Detaches all event listeners from all targets.

name: unlisten
description:
Detaches the event listener from the event target. This does nothing if the
event listener is already detached.

presentationTimeOffset_
description:
Used for DASH CVOD case, only for LIVE
cts of first sample in timescale 1000

name: constructor
description:
Create an Event work-alike object based on the dictionary.
The event should contain all of the same properties from the dict.

name: timeStamp
description:
According to MDN, Chrome uses high-res timers instead of epoch time.
Follow suit so that timeStamps on FakeEvents use the same base as
on native Events.

name: stopped
description: Non-standard property read by FakeEventTarget to stop processing listeners.

name: preventDefault
description:
Does nothing, since FakeEvents have no default.  Provided for compatibility
with native Events.

name: stopImmediatePropagation
description:
Stops processing event listeners for this event.  Provided for compatibility
with native Events.

name: stopPropagation
description:
Does nothing, since FakeEvents do not bubble.  Provided for compatibility
with native Events.

name: src/Utils/FakeEventTarget.js
FakeEventTarget
description:
A work-alike for EventTarget.  Only DOM elements may be true EventTargets,
but this can be used as a base class to provide event dispatch to non-DOM
classes.  Only FakeEvents should be dispatched.

name: addEventListener
description: Add an event listener to this object.

params.name: type
params.description: The event type to listen for.

params.name: listener
params.description:
The callback or
  listener object to invoke.

params.name: optCapturing
params.description:
Ignored.  do not have
  parents, so events neither capture nor bubble.

name: removeEventListener
description: Remove an event listener from this object.

params.name: type
params.description: The event type for which you wish to remove a listener.

params.name: listener
params.description:
The callback or
  listener object to remove.

params.name: optCapturing
params.description:
Ignored.  FakeEventTargets do not have
  parents, so events neither capture nor bubble.

name: dispatchEvent
description: Dispatch an event from this object.

params.name: event
params.description: The event to be dispatched from this object.

return.description: True if the default action was prevented.

name: constructor
description: A simple multimap template.

name: push
description: Add a key, value pair to the map.

name: set
description: Set an array of values for the key, overwriting any previous data.

name: has
description: Check for a key.

name: get
description: Get a list of values by key.

return.description: or null if no such key exists.

name: getAll
description: Get a list of all values.

name: remove
description: Remove a specific value, if it exists.

name: keys
description: Get all keys from the multimap.

name: clear
description: Clear all keys and values from the multimap.

content:
# How to develop #

## Project Repository
git clone https://git-stream.neulion.net.cn:745/player/html5player.git

## Dev server 
Run `npm run start` for a dev server. 

Navigate to http://localhost:8000/. The app will automatically reload if you change any of the source files.

Navigate to http://localhost:8000/uncompiled.html to debug core libraries.

## Build
- Run `npm run build` to build the project. 
- Run `npm run dist` for a production build.

The build artifacts will be stored in the dist/ directory.

## Running unit tests
Run `npm run test` to execute the unit tests via Karma.

## Docs
- Run `npm run docs` to generate API documents for release with jsdoc
- Run `npm run docs:dev` to generate internal documents with esdoc
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "eshtml5player",
  "version": "3.0.1",
  "description": "HTML5 Adaptive Player",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "webpack",
    "build:hlsjs": "cd 3rd/hls.js/ && npm i && npm run build",
    "build:muxjs": "cd 3rd/mux.js/ && npm i && npm run build",
    "build:m3u8parser": "cd 3rd/m3u8-parser/ && npm i && npm run build",
    "build:shaka": "cd 3rd/shaka-player/ && python ./build/all.py",
    "dist": "npm run lint && npm run release",
    "start": "webpack-dev-server",
    "release": "webpack",
    "lint": "eslint src",
    "test": "karma start",
    "test:winnodrm": "karma start --browsers Chrome --drm=false",
    "test:win": "karma start --browsers Chrome,IE,Edge,Firefox",
    "test:mac": "karma start --browsers Chrome,Firefox,SafariPrivate",
    "docs": "jsdoc -c jsdoc.conf.json",
    "docs:dev": "esdoc"
  },
  "author": "Endeavor Streaming",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.4",
    "babel-plugin-add-module-exports": "^0.2.1",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-exclude-source-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.1",
    "eslint-config-standard": "^11.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.12.0",
    "eslint-plugin-node": "^6.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^3.8.0",
    "eslint-plugin-standard": "^3.1.0",
    "filemanager-webpack-plugin": "^1.0.26",
    "git-revision-webpack-plugin": "^2.5.1",
    "ink-docstrap": "^1.3.2",
    "jasmine": "^2.5.3",
    "jasmine-core": "^2.5.2",
    "jsdoc": "^3.5.5",
    "karma": "^2.0.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.0.0",
    "karma-edge-launcher": "^0.2.0",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-htmlfile-reporter": "^0.3.5",
    "karma-ie-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-jasmine": "^1.1.0",
    "karma-jasmine-html-reporter": "^0.2.2",
    "karma-mocha-reporter": "^2.2.5",
    "karma-safari-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-safari-private-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-verbose-reporter": "0.0.5",
    "webpack": "^4.20.2",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "^2.0.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.1.1",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^3.1.1"
  }
}
